channel.title: Cammy PvP Reinstated
channel.description:
[center]Hello everyone; Just gunna begin with a short intro.
My name is Matt. I am 17, and from Ontario, Canada. I attend College in September, and am working on a PvP Base. Below are our features from our google Page.
We are looking for;
- Coders - Graphic Designers
[code] [i]Application[/i] Ingame Name: Availability: Do you have a mic: Do you have MSN: What can you do for us: Hobbies: Additional: [/code]
[b]Welcome to Cammy PvP Reinstated![/b]
Why play [i]Cammy PvP Reinstated?[/i]
We are a spawn PvP based server, which is unique, and based off Cammy PvP. We chose this base, due to the influx of good ole’ times, and memories we had. So, what’s different? Our graphics, models, animations, features and so much more! We have all 641 items, curses, overloads, claws etc. Get ready for the ultimate PK experience!
[b]Features[/b]
[i]Webclient[/i] [i]Wildernes timer that counts from 10[/i] [i]Curses working 100%![/i] [i]Custom quest tab like no-other server![/i] [i]Rocktails 100%[/i] [i]Overloads 100%[/i] [i]All Turmoil 100%[/i] [i]All Magic working 100%[/i] [i]Staff of Light working 100%[/i] [i]All Godswords, Dragon Claws working 100% with proper hits[/i] [i]All Chaotic Items 100%[/i] [i]Slayer Helmet 100%[/i] [i]Elite Void with proper effects![/i] [i]All PvP Armours and Weapons with proper effects and specials![/i] [i]And a lot more, come check us out today! [/i] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/20055014/ditch.bmp[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/20055014/pvp.bmp[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/20055014/pvpshop2.bmp[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/20055014/cammypvphome.bmp[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/20055014/questtab.bmp[/img] [/center]

item.title: Cammy PvP Reinstated
item.dc:creator: @DannyC DannyC
item.description:
@DannyC wrote:

Application
Ingame Name: Pure
Availability:Not much happening in life atm, so i’m free.
Do you have a mic: Yes.
Do you have MSN: Yes.
What can you do for us: I can code you just about anything you want me to.
Hobbies: Sports and pc
Additional: I know alot about C# and Java. Nuff said <3

[center]Hello everyone; Just gunna begin with a short intro.

Welcome to Cammy PvP Reinstated!

Why play Cammy PvP Reinstated?

We are a spawn PvP based server, which is unique, and based off Cammy PvP. We chose this base, due to the influx of good ole’ times, and memories we had. So, what’s different? Our graphics, models, animations, features and so much more! We have all 641 items, curses, overloads, claws etc. Get ready for the ultimate PK experience!

Features

Webclient
Wildernes timer that counts from 10
Curses working 100%!
Custom quest tab like no-other server!
Rocktails 100%
Overloads 100%
All Turmoil 100%
All Magic working 100%
Staff of Light working 100%
All Godswords, Dragon Claws working 100% with proper hits
All Chaotic Items 100%
Slayer Helmet 100%
Elite Void with proper effects!
All PvP Armours and Weapons with proper effects and specials!
And a lot more, come check us out today!
